Ilja Preuss wrote:

>  > We're
>  > thinking about using it with scenario based tests. I am
>  > missing something? If you guys write unit test with jWebUnit,
>  > what's your "unit"? A request? Two requests? A scenario?
> 
> I don't think you can write fine grained "unit tests" with jWebUnit. If
> I remember correctly, it was proposed as an alternative to HttpUnit,
> which isn't a unit testing framework either (despite its name).

I don't know about jWebUnit out of the box, but there's no reason one 
couldn't use jWebUnit to test web page and web page templates in 
isolation from the rest of the system. I show the appropriate techniques 
in _JUnit Recipes_ using HtmlUnit, rather than jWebUnit. (The two tools 
are very similar.)
